name: Atlantic Frenzy
description: Atlantic Frenzy brings the popular arcade fishing game to your mobile devices with Play to Earn! Engage in the one-of-a-kind PvP mode with your friends and compete to be king of the seas! Play to Earn - Earn currencies by hunting fishes and treasures! PvP Battle – Compete against your friends and find out who the superior fisher is. Boss Fishes – Experience the exhilaration of coming face to face with captivating Boss Fishes and get rewarded handsomely for successfully capturing one! Special Fishes – Unique creatures like Vortex Fishes and Bomb Crabs offer exciting ways to fish.
